prensentation.paragraph1: years of experience in software and data engineering, with a passion for building innovative solutions and a strong foundation in computer science. Always eager to learn and explore new technologies, I am currently focused on expanding my expertise in data engineering and cloud computing.
prensentation.paragraph2: Don't hesitate to contact me if you want to discuss about a project, a collaboration or just to say hi!

prensentation.title: AI Software & Data Engineer
prensentation.intro: I build reliable data and user-oriented industrial softwares.

about: I'm a {age} years old french software engineer with more than <bold>{experience} years of experience</bold> in the field. Like many boys in my generation, I got my first interest in IT thanks to video games and the first forums/IRC channels about various topics I used to visit. From my first Minecraft server hosted on my parents' computer to my first script to automate a boring task, I've always been passionate about technology, especially IT.

I started my journey into programming in high school with <bold>EasyPIC</bold> motherboard and <bold>Raspberry PI Uno</bold>. Thanks to my teachers, I discovered the basics of programming and electronics, which pushed me to enter engineering studies. There I learned the basics of programming with <bold>C</bold>, <bold>C++</bold>, <bold>Java</bold>, and <bold>Web</bold>, but most of all <bold>software engineering principles</bold> and how to work in a team. I finished my studies with a specialization in <bold>High Performance Computing and Data Processing</bold>.

As I have always been interested in industries, I started my career in both the Oil and Gas industry and the aerospace industry. I worked on various topics such as <bold>parallel computing</bold>, <bold>real-time data processing</bold>, <bold>data visualization</bold>, building of <bold>API</bold> and <bold>modern web UI</bold>.
I'm working since 2023 on AI-based softwares, building <bold>AI assistants</bold> and <bold>data processing platforms</bold> as a <bold>AI Software & Data Engineer</bold>.

descriptions.content: I am currently working as a <bold>Senior Software Engineer</bold> at <bold>ThinkDeep AI</bold>, a startup specialized in developing <bold>AI-powered software solutions</bold>.

items.content: <bold>DeepBrain</bold> : platform extracting the knowledge from documents & data using online and on-premise LLM.
subitems: Designed and implemented a group feature, integrated with <bold>Azure Entra ID</bold>, enabling secure knowledge and assistants sharing.
Improved the user experience with new UI components and better performance.

items.content: <bold>AI Assistant</bold> : working for <bold>DGFiP</bold> (French tax administration) to build an AI platform for public agents.
subitems: Development of administration features (users, prompts, alerts).
Improved overall project code quality by refactoring and formalization of practices.

descriptions.content: I also mentor and help younger developers with best practices and technical guidance.
Exhibitor at <bold>NVIDIA GTC Europe</bold> in Paris.

I worked as a <bold>Tech-Lead</bold> and <bold>Software Engineer</bold> at TotalEnergies Denmark, for the <bold>Digital Laboratory (DLAB)</bold> team, creating <bold>PoC softwares</bold> for the Production, HSE, Logistics, and C&P departments.
I structured the development environment to accompany the growth of the team (5 Data-Scientists, 2 Software Engineers). I managed Azure resources and Windows servers.

I designed and developed applications involving <bold>Generative AI</bold>, complexe user interactions (chat, searches, animations), <bold>data processing</bold>, <bold>health and usage monitoring</bold>, and <bold>SAP</bold> data integration.
<bold>Two Applications in the Top 10 of the TotalEnergies "E&P Best Innovators" awards.</bold>

On behalf of <bold>Viveris Technologies</bold>, I was part of a team of <bold>5 engineers</bold> in charge of the development of a software managing <bold>ground and satellite communications</bold>, including <bold>encryption</bold> and <bold>decryption</bold>.

I developed new features and sub-applications for this project, including a <bold>new testing framework</bold> for unit and integration testing, adhering to strict quality requirements and code coverage standards.

Member of the AVO <bold>geophysicist team</bold>, I worked on a new set of <bold>computation algorithms</bold> and <bold>visualization tools</bold> for the SISMAGE-CIG geophysics platform owned by TotalEnergies.
I also managed <bold>3 interns</bold> to develop a web application containing small geophysics tools.
